properties.entry: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT REPORT_NO, RPT_DATE, RPT_CATEGORY_NAME, RPT_CONTENT, M.MEM_ID AS RECIVE_REPORT, R.MEM_ID AS SEND_REPORT, RPT_STATUS FROM TB_REPORT TR JOIN TB_REPORT_CATEGORY TRC ON (TR.RPT_CATEGORY_NO = TRC.RPT_CATEGORY_NO) JOIN TB_MEMBER M ON (M.MEM_NO = RECIVE_REPORT) JOIN TB_MEMBER R ON (R.MEM_NO = SEND_REPORT) ORDER BY REPORT_NO DESC) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
